trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESHLWTRANSFORM_00946_TRANSFORMHLX2025_000_000<tab>Up to something? Me? Never! I am but a fun-loving imp, here to help my fellow revelers enjoy the Wake! And I can fashion you a <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> convincing guise for the masquerade. Ehehehe...

TEXT_FESHLWTRANSFORM_00946_TRANSFORMHLX2025_000_001<tab>All I need is for you to recall a journey, a journey unforgettable. Traverse your memories, and tell me what─or perhaps <var 1A 02 /var>who<var 1A 01 /var>─you see...
TEXT_FESHLWTRANSFORM_00946_TRANSFORMHLX2025_000_004<tab>Ehehehe... That will do nicely. Don't worry, this won't hurt much at all! Just close your eyes...
TEXT_FESHLWTRANSFORM_00946_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>The transfiguration can be removed by using the “Unveil” action, or by canceling the “Transfiguration” status effect.
TEXT_FESHLWTRANSFORM_00946_TRANSFORMHLX2025_000_010<tab>Come back with word from the Impresario...or not at all. Ehehehe...
TEXT_FESHLWTRANSFORM_00946_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>The unsavory imp only offers transfiguration services for the duration of All Saints' Wake.
